name: Jump Mask!
description:
Jump Mask! These are more than 20 thoughtful and difficult levels, help your hero's mask collect all the fruits that were lost at all levels. You will have to face many obstacles of varying difficulty, from ordinary spikes to the enemy that will chase you. Your hero’s battle cry, Jump Mask!

There are legends that somewhere on the levels there are secret messages from the main villain, Mask, who planned to steal all the fruits, but on the way to his castle he lost half of all the fruits. With the help of messages you can find the way to the villain and once and for all eradicate evil from this world, and let everyone hear your battle cry "Jump, mask!"

Amazing features of "Jump Mask!"

+ Over 20 thoughtful levels
+ 4 beautiful character masks, Frog, Virtual and Pink Man
+ 20 obstacles of varying difficulty
+ 5 different enemies
+ Great soundtrack
+ Speedway system
+ Standalone game, does not require an internet connection

How to play

- Control your character with the buttons on the screen
- Run and jump to overcome obstacles

Contacts

Twitter: TaffyLab

P.S. Thanks to Pixel Frog for the provided graphics.
